original_text: The soldiers decided to kill the prisoners that they were guarding. They did not want these men to swim to the land and escape.
korean_text: 군인들은 죄수가 헤엄쳐서 도망할까 하여 그들을 죽이는 것이 좋다 하였으나

sentences.original_text: The soldiers decided to kill the prisoners
They did not want these men to swim to the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이 남자들이 땅으로 수영해서 가는 것을 원하지 않았습니다
